text: We will ensure that every family has a pucca house with water connection, toilet, electricity and LPG connection by 2022.
summary: Pucca house with basic amenities for every family by 2022
statusReason: PMAY-G achieved 2.95 crore houses by 2024 against 2.95 crore target, but universal coverage not achieved. Jal Jeevan Mission reached 77% rural households with tap connections by Feb 2024.

text: We are committed to making India a 5 trillion dollar economy by 2024.
statusReason: India's GDP was approximately $3.5 trillion in 2024. The target was later revised to 2027-28.

text: We will invest Rs. 100 lakh crore in infrastructure over the next 5 years.
summary: Rs. 100 lakh crore infrastructure investment in 5 years
statusReason: National Infrastructure Pipeline launched with Rs. 111 lakh crore investment plan. Capital expenditure increased from Rs. 3.4 lakh crore (2019-20) to Rs. 10 lakh crore (2023-24).

text: We will double the income of farmers by 2022.
statusReason: Government committee report showed farmer income grew 59% in nominal terms between 2015-16 and 2022-23, falling short of doubling. Real income growth was lower due to inflation.

evidence.title: Situation Assessment Survey of Agricultural Households

text: We will ensure that no Indian will be left out of development because he/she does not have an Aadhaar Card, Ration Card, Birth Certificate or any other document.
summary: Ensure no citizen excluded from schemes due to lack of documents
statusReason: Aadhaar coverage reached 99% of adult population. However, exclusion errors due to biometric failures and document issues continue to be reported in welfare schemes.
